attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many days world wide, in a year set aside for rememberance of many events,it is amazing that a day such as APRIL FOOLS DAY,is celebrated world wide, So why is GRANDPARENTS DAY,also not recognize world wide,  we are very important and supportive in todays society ,but most of all Grandparents should also have a day world wide for rememberance for their love and support to the families. There for Goverment should acknowledge how important we are, and  for the money we save the tax payers and Goverments.
Maggie Tuttle

rejection.details: Outside the remit or powers of the Prime Minister and Government. Reasons: We believe a Grandparents Day already exists. Last year it was celebrated on Sunday October 5.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
